Publications Report
- 3 -
Reprintings
COLLEGE TEACHING AS A CAREER., By Committee on College Teaching.
Published 1958. Fourth printing May 1961s 50,000 copies/ Free.
CHINESE IDEAS IN THE WEST. By Derk Bodde. Published 1948. Second
printing June 1961: 2,000 copies. $0.50.
DENTISTRY IN THE UNITED STATES: STATUS, NEEDS, AND RECOMMENDATIONS.
Summary Report of the Commission on the Survey of Dentistry in
the United States. Byron S. Hollinshead, director. Published
1960. Third printing June 1961: 5,000 copies. $1.00.
A PROPOSED PROGRAM OF FEDERAL ACTION TO STRENGTHEN HIGHER EDUCATION.
Statement of the Executive Committee and the Committee on RelaÂ¬
tionships of Higher Education to the Federal Government of the
American Council on Education. Published 1961. Second printing
July 1961: 5,000 copies. Free.
POLICIES AND PRACTICES IN FACULTY EVALUATION. A Report of a Survey
Conducted by the Committee on College Teaching of the American
Council on Education. Prepared by John W. Gustad. Preprinted
May 1961 from the July 1961 issue of THE EDUCATIONAL RECORD.
Second printing July 1961: 2,500 copies. Free.
EDUCATIONAL MEASUREMENT. Edited by E. F. Lindquist. Published 1951.
Fourth printing October 1961: 2,000 copies. $6.00.
